# File lib/bit-struct/nested-field.rb, line 24
    def describe opts
      if opts[:expand]
        opts = opts.dup
        opts[:byte_offset] = offset / 8
        opts[:omit_header] = opts[:omit_footer] = true
        nested_class.describe(nil, opts) {|desc| yield desc}
      else
        super
      end
    end
